roleset.name: reduce the impact of
roleset.note: MITIGATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'mitigate' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No access to verbnet. No comparison. (from mitigate.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: only example
example.text: While many problems would attend a restructuring of Columbia, investors say [Mr. Spiegel]-1 is mulling such a plan *trace*-1 to mitigate Columbia's junk problems.
